/>
XII.i.1.B.2.g
.
Claims for Which P&F Service Determines Eligibility to DIC Benefits Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
Pension and Fiduciary (P&F) Service determines eligibility for cases in which
VA Form 10-2633, Report of Special Incident Involving a Beneficiary
, indicates that death may have been due to circumstances contemplated by
38 U.S.C. 1151
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Common Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Processing Issues
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
